item.title: CSC115 Ch5 HW Help
item.description: Before beginning this assignment we must first take care of a couple housekeeping things in R. First you must load the package TurtleGraphics library(TurtleGraphics) Exercise 1 The Problem Using the TurtleGraphics funciton write a function called ‘turtle_gon()’ that draws a regular polygon. The user should be able to specifiy the side-length and the number of sides. Usig your function draw a polygon with 12 sides, each having a length of 15 units.
